name: Quincy
detailed_location: Northeast of thesouthern Nevada wind farm
description:
Quincy is a 28 year-old African American Male.

A deceased African American NCR soldier who was stationed at Camp Forlorn Hope before his death during a battle against Caesar's Legion.

Quincy's Personality: Disciplined, dutiful, and loyal. Quincy takes pride in his service to the NCR and follows orders without question. Despite his military training, he shows genuine concern for his fellow soldiers.

Quincy's Backstory: Quincy was a dedicated soldier in the NCR Army, stationed at Camp Forlorn Hope in 2281. He, along with Harry and another unnamed trooper, was sent by Quartermaster Carl Mayes on a supply run to HELIOS ONE. Unfortunately, he never returned, falling in battle against Caesar's Legion forces during an attack on the camp. His body was never recovered, leaving his fate uncertain to those who knew him.
